Set.Text: [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output is +100% during their [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages. Earn [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST] Great Artists, [ICON_GREAT_MUSICIAN] Musicians, and [ICON_GREAT_WRITER] Writers 100% faster during their [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages and [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 25% longer.
